headline.main: NAZIS SHOW CAPTIVE AS MOLOTOFF'S SON; Presented to Newspaper Men to Dispute Charges of Cruelty

abstract: German Propaganda Min shows captive allegedly Molotoff's son to newspaper men, Berlin press conf; captive disputes charges of German atrocities against USSR prisoners
snippet: German Propaganda Min shows captive allegedly Molotoff's son to newspaper men, Berlin press conf; captive disputes charges of German atrocities against USSR prisoners...

byline.original: By Telephone to THE NEW YORK TIMES
